data.name: Ashmedai: Queen of Lust - Art Collection
data.detailed_description:
This DLC does not modify gameplay or your in game gallery progress. After purchase the art collection can be found inside your game's install folder and can be viewed with any image viewer. Instructions are provided below.

This massive Art Collection contains over 650 pieces of artwork from the game in JPG or PNG format for easy viewing.

This includes the hentai scenes, enemy and party member skill poses, enemy damage poses, story scenes and the unlockable gallery artwork from the game.
  • 160+ Story and Hentai Scene Images
  • 350+ Party Member and Enemy Poses
  • 130+ Miscellaneous Gallery Images

If you have not completed the game it will contain spoilers.

How to Access the DLC

  • Right Click on the game in your Steam library

  • Select Properties


  • Click Browse


  • Open the DLC folder


  • Success!


All characters are over 18 years of age.
